column1: Local Foods////The shrimp and crab sandwitch is amazing.  I believe all of the food is locally purchased and very fresh.  The soup was excellent as well.  It always seems to be moderately busy
column2: but not crazy busy.  Probably the best thing on the menu is the side order of kale.  It has little raisin things in it and I think it is the best kale I have ever had.  I highly recommend this local restaurant which is near West University.
